caption.p: The effect of different concentrations of LRE extracts against PolyQ40 aggregation in C. elegans. ( a) PolyQ40 formation after treatment with of different concentration of LRE; ( b) Visualization of PolyQ40 formation by fluorescence microscopy: ( b) untreated worms; ( c) DMSO-treated worms; ( d– f) after treatment with 50, 100 and 200 μg/mL of LRE; ( g) worms treated with 50 μg/mL of EGCG. Values are mean ± SEM of at least three independent runs. *** p < 0.001 vs. DMSO.
